name: Border Youth Tennis Exchange
description: BYTE now operates year-round in California, Arizona, and Mexico, serving over 3000 student-athletes annually at 13 in-person sites. Student-athletes range from age 6 to age 75, the majority living in locked institutional settings. BYTE expertise is high quality bilingual instruction and adapting curricula for public health settings and students-athletes with histories of acute trauma. ONLINE APPLICATION and Communications
